description:
This Scully 30 Dry Duffle is second quality as the snaps that hold the roll-top closure strips in places can sometimes break off. (you can still use the Duffle without the snaps, so we’re offering them at a discount for you to enjoy) Unstrapped from a roof rack, tossed in a cargo hold, and splashed onto the floor of a canoe – just another day for this rugged expedition dry bag. The rectangular shape is stable, stackable and makes it easy to find small items. The upper flap unzips to reveal a wide roll-top closure that can be sealed to keep water out, or strapped out of the way for use as a conventional duffle. Multiple lash points let you secure the Scully to any surface. The 30L version fits on a bike or motorcycle rack, and holds enough gear for minimalist overnights or day trips in unpredictable weather.

  • Coated nylon fabric is super rugged and PVC-free
  • Top flap zipper has oversized pull loops to accommodate gloved hands or chilled fingers
  • Inside top flap has a zippered mesh pocket for quick-access items
  • Snaps hold the wide roll-top closure strips in place to ensure easy rolling and an effective seal
  • Purge valve allows air evacuation to make the bag as small as possible
  • Carrying options include top, side and end handles or comfortable, stow-away shoulder straps
  • All materials are PVC-free except for the purge valve, which is hard PVC. Hard PVC contains fewer eco-hazardous plasticizers than soft PVC, and is fully recyclable
  • Note: these dry bags do not provide submersible waterproof protection or impact protection. For electronics, we recommend hard cases with gasket seals
  • Rocksolid Guarantee still applies, however returns will not be accepted for missing snaps
name: MEC Scully 30 Dry Duffle *Seconds
